description: This file defines a React-style component for a Tic Tac Toe game using the Qwik framework. It manages game state, rendering, and game logic (checking for a winner, handling moves, resetting). It also includes styling and image assets references.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Evaluates the current game board to determine if there is a winner, a draw, or if the game should continue.

methods.name: play
methods.description: Handles a player's move, updates the board, checks for a winner or draw, and switches turns.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game state to the initial empty board and starting player.

methods.name: pieceContent
methods.description: Returns JSX content for a given cell: an image of Shrek or Bee depending on the mark, or null if empty.
